definition: to withdraw/to pull back/to contract/to shrink/to reduce/abbreviation/also pr. [su4]
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: In general, the topic of hyper sclability can be challenging to address.
sentences.chinese: 总的来说，超级可伸缩性是一个极具挑战性的主题。

sentences.english: Reinforcing sayer is two layers of braid fiber with high retractility .
sentences.chinese: 增强层为两层高伸缩性编织纤维。
确定可伸缩性和高可用性需求。

sentences.english: And we'll provide a general rule on post-deployment scalability.
sentences.chinese: 还要提供关于部署后可伸缩性的一般规则。

sentences.english: Analyze all of these things in terms of scalability of operations.
sentences.chinese: 要从操作可伸缩性的角度分析所有这些方面。

sentences.english: There is not much stretch in this collar, I can hardly get it over my head.
sentences.chinese: 这领子没有伸缩性，我穿衣服时头简直穿不进去。

sentences.english: If this is the case, then you get linear scalability.
sentences.chinese: 如果事实确实如此，那么您就可以获得线性可伸缩性。

sentences.english: You must achieve scalability without sacrificing ease of development or standardization.
sentences.chinese: 您必须获得可伸缩性又不牺牲开发或标准化的方便性。

sentences.english: This product is highly elastic, and flexibility, abrasion resistance and flame resistance.
sentences.chinese: 本产品具有很强的弹力性，伸缩性，耐磨性和阻燃性。

sentences.english: Scalability from mid-sized to large enterprises
sentences.chinese: 从中小企业到大型企业的可伸缩性。

sentences.english: If it’s a straight line, that’s quite good: “linear scalability”.
sentences.chinese: 如果它是一条直线，那就是非常好的“线性伸缩性”。

sentences.english: This edition represents the ultimate in data warehouse performance and scalability.
sentences.chinese: 此版本是数据仓库性能和可伸缩性的最终版本。

sentences.english: The DSCM provides an effective tool for the evaluation of electrostrictive response.
sentences.chinese: 该方法为电致伸缩性能的研究提供了一种有效的工具。

sentences.english: The major disadvantage is that this locking strategy might not be very scalable.
sentences.chinese: 但是这种锁定策略的主要缺点就是可伸缩性较差。

sentences.english: To scale data should be duplicated  instead of being normalized.
sentences.chinese: 为了提高可伸缩性，数据应该重复而非正规化。

definition: porous/having many holes (e.g. filter gauze or sieve)
